definition: to admire wholeheartedly/to fall in love with
to overturn/to collapse/to lean/to tend/to incline/to pour out

sentences.english: His modesty certainly appealed to the public.
sentences.chinese: 他的谦逊无疑使民众倾心。

sentences.english: People fall in love with the circled golden woollen carpet AT first sight because of its unique design.
sentences.chinese: 盘金羊毛地毯以其独特的设计让人一见倾心。

sentences.english: Henry and Jeanne take a shine to each other.
sentences.chinese: 亨利和珍妮彼此一见倾心。

sentences.english: If Hurstwood had one leaning, it was toward notabilities .
sentences.chinese: 倘若赫斯渥有什么可倾心的，那就是倾心名流。

sentences.english: If Hurstwood had one leaning, it was toward notabilities .
sentences.chinese: 倘若赫斯渥有什么可倾心的，那就是倾心名流。
他倾心付出他的一切来踢球。

sentences.english: Chloe is taken with him too, until the police arrive and arrest Kevin for the theft of several Dalmatian puppies.
sentences.chinese: 克洛艾也倾心于他，直到来了警察，以偷窃数只花。

sentences.english: When I meet her, I had the hots for her.
sentences.chinese: 当我遇见她，我就对她倾心不已。

sentences.english: There is always someone indulging in the romance of River Seine.
sentences.chinese: 总有人倾心于那塞纳河畔中源远流淌的浪漫人文风情。

sentences.english: Don't underestimate love at first sight.
After the heart-to-heart talk, they understand each other better.
sentences.chinese: 在这次倾心交谈之后，他们加深了对对方的理解。

sentences.english: Yu Rang was the tragic figure contributively depicted by Si Maqian.
sentences.chinese: 豫让是史公倾心描绘的悲剧人物形象。

sentences.english: Lifetime, v. warmth not only ruin, fall in love meet, warm with Ann.
sentences.chinese: 有生之年，只诉温暖不言殇，倾心相遇，安暖相陪。

sentences.english: I was already developing a crush on her.
It's the thing that would take a lady's fancy.
sentences.chinese: 这是会让女士们一闻倾心的香水。

definition: to fall in love/to love sb or sth dearly (lover, or art)
in love with/to feel deeply attached to
to feel a rush of excitement (idiom)
